reapack.name: neutronic_Show track or take envelope for last touched parameter.lua
reapack.desc: Show track or take envelope for last touched parameter

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + initial release

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # check the pointer when parameter modulation is enabled

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # check if touched parameter exists

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # change ai_insert default to false # reliably update arrange when ai_insert is false # fix creating undo points in some cases

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: v1.00 - May 13 2019 + initial release

reapack.name: neutronic_Quick add FX or track template.lua
reapack.desc: Quick add FX or track template

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + initial realease

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + added input_ovrd option to allow users hardcode a search query

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + ability to apply track templates to selected tracks # moved in-script help to console

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + added "2", "3", "j" and "c" as shorthands for vst2/vst3/js/chain fx types

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + AU format support + video processor support + option to reverse the /a flag behavior + option to preserve layouts when applying track templates + safeguard against false JS files # improved JS instances naming in FX chains

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # improved FX listing logic

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + start a search query with a whitespace to clear relevant FX chains before adding FX + ignore plugins that begin with # # show FX chain when adding it (instead of floating last FX in chain)

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # insert track templates after the last selected track or at the end of the track list # respect folder depth level if the last selected track is also the last track in folder

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + option to keep the track name when applying a track template (off by default)

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + option to clear master track FX chain before adding FX # open plugins inside FX Chains if chains are visible

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + custom resizable GUI + in-script favorites system # many UX improvements (check the demo video - http://bit.ly/seeQA2)

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # temporarily disable VST cross-checking

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + option to toggle FX/track template GUI floating after insertion + prompt to insert tracks to put FX on, when there are no tracks in project and master track is unselected + pass Ctrl(Cmd)+Z and Ctrl(Cmd)+Shift+Z to main window + double click speed variable in the cfg file (dbl_click_speed) # slightly increased double click speed

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + option to show favorites when the search box is empty + ability to reorder favorites with Alt + Shift + Up/Down

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + option to clear the search box after FX/template insertion + put VSTi/AUi on a new named/armed/monitored track when no tracks are selected + respect FX filter string rules in REAPER Preferences --> Plug-ins + ESC closes Quick Adder when the search box is empty # constrain favorites reordering to Alt + Shift + Up/Down only # improved "FX not found" warning # updated help file

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
+ drag and drop support + dropping an effect on empty TCP/MCP automatically creates a named track with the effect on it + options for "no track selected" scenario + ability to pin Quick Adder + place text box carriage with mouse cursor
NOTE: some new functionality requires SWS and/or JS APIs.

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + search and run actions + add actions to favorites + new filter to search actions only + define position of actions in the global search order + display actions toggle state in real time + option to toggle the actions functionality on/off + ability to resize the search view horizontally + notify user if there is no SWS and/or JS API installed # enhanced exact matching logic # enhanced FX filter string parsing

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
+ support script docking with the title bar menu option (Windows only) # check JS names for double quotes
New in v2.15: + search and run actions + add actions to favorites + new filter to search actions only + define position of actions in the global search order + display actions toggle state in real time + option to toggle the actions functionality on/off + ability to resize the search view horizontally + notify user if there is no SWS and/or JS API installed # enhanced exact matching logic # enhanced FX filter string parsing

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
Text selection for editing: + marquee select search box text + "Ctrl(Cmd) + A" or double-click a search query to select all text + "Ctrl(Cmd) + Left/Right" to move one word at a time + "Shift + Left/Right" to select one letter at a time + "Ctrl(Cmd) + Shift + Left/Right" to select one word at a time + "Home" to go to start of the search query + "End" to go to the end of search query
The docked mode: + right-click the hints bar to dock/undock the script's GUI + automatically set result rows number when docked + option to show result placeholders when docked + highlight the GUI when docked and the script is focused + temporarily undock the script when user opens QA2 Preferences + adjust results text size for the docked mode + open the filter tray vertically when docked and GUI width is less than the tray width
Various: + option to float FX at mouse cursor + maximum number of result rows increased to 99 for the undocked mode + unlock minimum horizontal GUI size + HiDPI/Retina displays support # make sure ALT + Key shortcuts do not collide with SHIFT + ALT + Key # fixed the "FX" filter sorting # fixed search box memory clearing when backspasing a whole query # insert correct result when no tracks selected and "Clear search box after insertion" is on # don't reset QA2 result selection after insertion if search box is empty # bypass gfx.mouse_cap hang on macOS when inserting FX through double-clicking

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
# recall docked state on QA2 reopening
New in v2.20 Text selection for editing: + marquee select search box text + "Ctrl(Cmd) + A" or double-click a search query to select all text + "Ctrl(Cmd) + Left/Right" to move one word at a time + "Shift + Left/Right" to select one letter at a time + "Ctrl(Cmd) + Shift + Left/Right" to select one word at a time + "Home" to go to start of the search query + "End" to go to the end of search query
The docked mode: + right-click the hints bar to dock/undock the script's GUI + automatically set result rows number when docked + option to show result placeholders when docked + highlight the GUI when docked and the script is focused + temporarily undock the script when user opens QA2 Preferences + adjust results text size for the docked mode + open the filter tray vertically when docked and GUI width is less than the tray width
Various: + option to float FX at mouse cursor + maximum number of result rows increased to 99 for the undocked mode + unlock minimum horizontal GUI size + HiDPI/Retina displays support # make sure ALT + Key shortcuts do not collide with SHIFT + ALT + Key # fixed the "FX" filter sorting # fixed search box memory clearing when backspasing a whole query # insert correct result when no tracks selected and "Clear search box after insertion" is on # don't reset QA2 result selection after insertion if search box is empty # bypass gfx.mouse_cap hang on macOS when inserting FX through double-clicking

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
# fixed Default Filter setting
New in v2.20 Text selection for editing: + marquee select search box text + "Ctrl(Cmd) + A" or double-click a search query to select all text + "Ctrl(Cmd) + Left/Right" to move one word at a time + "Shift + Left/Right" to select one letter at a time + "Ctrl(Cmd) + Shift + Left/Right" to select one word at a time + "Home" to go to start of the search query + "End" to go to the end of search query
The docked mode: + right-click the hints bar to dock/undock the script's GUI + automatically set result rows number when docked + option to show result placeholders when docked + highlight the GUI when docked and the script is focused + temporarily undock the script when user opens QA2 Preferences + adjust results text size for the docked mode + open the filter tray vertically when docked and GUI width is less than the tray width
Various: + option to float FX at mouse cursor + maximum number of result rows increased to 99 for the undocked mode + unlock minimum horizontal GUI size + HiDPI/Retina displays support # make sure ALT + Key shortcuts do not collide with SHIFT + ALT + Key # fixed the "FX" filter sorting # fixed search box memory clearing when backspasing a whole query # insert correct result when no tracks selected and "Clear search box after insertion" is on # don't reset QA2 result selection after insertion if search box is empty # bypass gfx.mouse_cap hang on macOS when inserting FX through double-clicking

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
# escape backslashes in JS descriptions
New in v2.20 Text selection for editing: + marquee select search box text + "Ctrl(Cmd) + A" or double-click a search query to select all text + "Ctrl(Cmd) + Left/Right" to move one word at a time + "Shift + Left/Right" to select one letter at a time + "Ctrl(Cmd) + Shift + Left/Right" to select one word at a time + "Home" to go to start of the search query + "End" to go to the end of search query
The docked mode: + right-click the hints bar to dock/undock the script's GUI + automatically set result rows number when docked + option to show result placeholders when docked + highlight the GUI when docked and the script is focused + temporarily undock the script when user opens QA2 Preferences + adjust results text size for the docked mode + open the filter tray vertically when docked and GUI width is less than the tray width
Various: + option to float FX at mouse cursor + maximum number of result rows increased to 99 for the undocked mode + unlock minimum horizontal GUI size + HiDPI/Retina displays support # make sure ALT + Key shortcuts do not collide with SHIFT + ALT + Key # fixed the "FX" filter sorting # fixed search box memory clearing when backspasing a whole query # insert correct result when no tracks selected and "Clear search box after insertion" is on # don't reset QA2 result selection after insertion if search box is empty # bypass gfx.mouse_cap hang on macOS when inserting FX through double-clicking

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + search FX browser folders + new FOL search filter for FX browser folders + option to disable FX folders searching (PREFS --> Search and ...) + new INS search filter for virtual instruments + FX search filter now gets effects only + configure Filter Tray items (right-click the tray button) + configure FX show options (right-click the Show FX button) # move "Show FX at mouse cursor" to FX show options # improve illegal characters sanitizing # internal optimizations

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
# fix script crash when parsing fxfolders.ini
New in v2.25 + search FX browser folders + new FOL search filter for FX browser folders + option to disable FX folders searching (PREFS --> Search and ...) + new INS search filter for virtual instruments + FX search filter now gets effects only + configure Filter Tray items (right-click the tray button) + configure FX show options (right-click the Show FX button) # move "Show FX at mouse cursor" to FX show options # improve illegal characters sanitizing # internal optimizations

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
# fix recalling favorites containing FX folder data # improve matching queries with numbers
New in v2.25 + search FX browser folders + new FOL search filter for FX browser folders + option to disable FX folders searching (PREFS --> Search and ...) + new INS search filter for virtual instruments + FX search filter now gets effects only + configure Filter Tray items (right-click the tray button) + configure FX show options (right-click the Show FX button) # move "Show FX at mouse cursor" to FX show options # improve illegal characters sanitizing # internal optimizations

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
+ Shift+Enter inserts templates above first selected track # more improvements to reaper-fxfolders.ini parsing # check VST names for illegal characters # fix script crash if AU match doesn't have a space between developer and plugin names # improved INS/FOL filters logic
New in v2.25 + search FX browser folders + new FOL search filter for FX browser folders + option to disable FX folders searching (PREFS --> Search and ...) + new INS search filter for virtual instruments + FX search filter now gets effects only + configure Filter Tray items (right-click the tray button) + configure FX show options (right-click the Show FX button) # move "Show FX at mouse cursor" to FX show options # improve illegal characters sanitizing # internal optimizations

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
+ Shift+Enter inserts templates above first selected track # more improvements to reaper-fxfolders.ini parsing # check VST names for illegal characters # improve overall character sanitizing logic # fix script crash if AU match doesn't have a space between developer and plugin names # improve INS/FOL filters logic
New in v2.25 + search FX browser folders + new FOL search filter for FX browser folders + option to disable FX folders searching (PREFS --> Search and ...) + new INS search filter for virtual instruments + FX search filter now gets effects only + configure Filter Tray items (right-click the tray button) + configure FX show options (right-click the Show FX button) # move "Show FX at mouse cursor" to FX show options # improve illegal characters sanitizing # internal optimizations

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
# fix script crash if reaper-fxfolders.ini does not exist
New in v2.25 + search FX browser folders + new FOL search filter for FX browser folders + option to disable FX folders searching (PREFS --> Search and ...) + new INS search filter for virtual instruments + FX search filter now gets effects only + configure Filter Tray items (right-click the tray button) + configure FX show options (right-click the Show FX button) # move "Show FX at mouse cursor" to FX show options # improve illegal characters sanitizing # internal optimizations

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
# better handling of empty strings in getFXfolder() and fxExclCheck()
New in v2.25 + search FX browser folders + new FOL search filter for FX browser folders + option to disable FX folders searching (PREFS --> Search and ...) + new INS search filter for virtual instruments + FX search filter now gets effects only + configure Filter Tray items (right-click the tray button) + configure FX show options (right-click the Show FX button) # move "Show FX at mouse cursor" to FX show options # improve illegal characters sanitizing # internal optimizations

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog:
# improve handling of filter strings with OR logical operator
New in v2.25 + search FX browser folders + new FOL search filter for FX browser folders + option to disable FX folders searching (PREFS --> Search and ...) + new INS search filter for virtual instruments + FX search filter now gets effects only + configure Filter Tray items (right-click the tray button) + configure FX show options (right-click the Show FX button) # move "Show FX at mouse cursor" to FX show options # improve illegal characters sanitizing # internal optimizations

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + Ctrl(Cmd) + Shift + Alt + Enter: inserts FX or template on new track and sends selected tracks (or track under mouse) to it # streamline targeting logic # update mouse cursor when switching views with key commands # improve hints # update help file

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + LeftWin + Alt + Enter: insert FX on a new track above the first selected track or the track under mouse cursor (Ctrl + Option + Return on macOS) # ignore "Auto-float newly created FX windows" in REAPER preferences

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # fix redundant extension check in some cases

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # more extension check fixes for macOS (non-retina with zero favorites)

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + scrollable results: introducing scrollbar and scrollwheel support + list all relevant entries if search bar is empty + display number of matches in hints bar + enhanced database scanning logic + provide short information on what is being scanned + prevent GUI lock when preparing database # do not refresh the list upon adding a match to favorites (enhances UX with new scrollable results) # fix crash when dropping FX on empty area and master track is selected # change "Always show favorites" to "List all if search is empty" (minds active filter) # change default Auto Refresh mode to "Do not auto refresh" # improved exact match searching # show correct FX GUI if ARA plugin is added and there are already other FX in chain

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + display main action shortcuts + Linux support

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # fix compatibility issues with SWS 2.12.1.3+ # fix incomplete results display for FOL and INS filters

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # ignore files with restricted access when preparing database

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # don't match vst_id in fxfolders.ini when the id is 0 # case insensitive fxfolders.ini lookup

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + support native Apple silicon REAPER builds (macOS-ARM) + macOS-ARM: use correct font sizes + macOS-ARM: scan relevant VST and AU ini files + report QA2 state to REAPER action list and toolbars + auto-adjust GUI size when moving it from non-retina to retina screen and vice versa # fix showing results on QA2 launch (when "List all ..." is enabled) # fix mouse cursor flicker that occurred in some cases

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + ability to control QA2 with external actions (downloaded separately) + post scanning status to REAPER info bar when siliently refreshing database # improve QA2 tab naming when docked # fix QA2 crash when scrolling zero results list # macOS: improve automatic GUI positioning

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: # improve string construction for FX_AddByName functions # fix missing VST3 plugins when filter is FOL

version.author: Neutronic
version.changelog: + add context menu (right-click) for search bar + add "Clear Search", "Copy" and "Paste" to search context menu + add "Ctrl(Cmd) + C" shortcut to copy selected search text + add "Ctrl(Cmd) + V" shortcut to paste text from clipboard # use up-to-date command IDs with favorite scripts/extensions # set initial GUI size to 4k for retina screens
